stages.name: MergeDocs
stages.description: Add documentation from doc repository. This needs to be done before Flatten and renames as some documentation applies to Mixins or to elements before they are renamed

stages.name: RemoveIncludes
stages.description: Remove include into MathMLElement as we are not importing MathML spec at this stage

stages.name: RemoveExtendedAttribute
stages.description: Remove Constructor attribute as one of the arguments 'newTarget' is of type 'Animatable' which is a mixin which is seemingly invalid. We will re-add an equivalent with a union for impls of Animatable in next step

stages.name: AddExtendedAttribute
stages.description: See previous step for explanation

config.extendedAttribute: Constructor( Animation source, (CSSPseudoElement or Element) newTarget )

stages.name: AddExtendedAttribute
stages.description: Convert TexImageSource into a marker type

stages.name: ConvertConstructorAttribute
stages.description: Convert from historic constructor attributes

stages.name: ConvertFactoryFunctionAttribute
stages.description: Convert legacy factory functions into a form that is compatible with Closure/Java mapping

stages.name: RemoveHTMLConstructor
stages.description: Remove constructors that are not invokable directly in Javascript binding

stages.name: AddExtendedAttribute
stages.description: Package up the elements defined by ECMA into a separate package to model behaviour of elemental2-core

stages.name: RemoveMember
stages.description: this is a legacy API that was left for backwards compatibility but causes issues in GWT because the objects returned used prototypes from the top level page rather than the containing iframe

stages.name: RemoveElement
stages.description: The HTMLFormControlsCollection overrides HTMLCollection with incompatible method so we patch it. This is not strictly consistent with js but not sure how else to handle it

stages.name: RemoveElement
stages.description: These are no longer needed once Navigator.getUserMedia is removed

stages.name: RemoveElement
stages.description: This defined in both webrtc_stats and webrtc so lets remove one

stages.name: RemoveMember
stages.description: the spec defines these members in RTCAudioHandlerStats which is the parent dictionary of RTCAudioReceiverStats

stages.name: RemoveMember
stages.description: the fileapi spec 'overrides' a operation on URL with a union of blob and the type defined in the mediasource spec. We re-add the blob variant in the fileapi_patch variant

stages.name: RemoveMember
stages.description: Change the type to convert to a const enumeration for improved typing

stages.name: ChangeArgumentType
stages.description: Change arguments to be more efficient type. Not strictly required but a good practie to enforce and cleans up the API

stages.name: ChangeArgumentType
stages.description: Tighten up the parameter types

stages.name: RemoveIncludes
stages.description: Both SVGURIReference and HTMLHyperlinkElementUtils mixin define the href attribute and they are defined as different types. USVString in HTMLHyperlinkElementUtils and SVGAnimatedString in SVGURIReference. This stage effectively selects the HTMLHyperlinkElementUtils variant which seems more authoritative

stages.name: RemoveElement
stages.description: The AudioWorkletProcessorConstructor is only used by elements exposed in the AudioWorklet exposure and references interfaces not available in Window exposure

stages.name: RemoveElement
stages.description: The ExtendableMessageEventInit is only used by elements exposed in the ServiceWorker exposure and references interfaces not available in Window exposure
